p: Injection volume, 1 μl of CH 2Cl 2 solution of tested samples; oven temperature programming: initial temperature, 40°C (isothermal for 3 min), then increased (4°C/min) to 160°C, followed by further increased to final temperature 280°C (10°C/min); injection temperature: 220°C carrier gas: helium at a flow rate of 1 ml/min; mass spectrometer, electronic ionization mode; ion source, 70 eV; mass range: 40–500 amu.
